item.title: GPT-5 in Azure AI Foundry: The future of AI apps and agents starts here
item.description: Today, we’re announcing general availability of OpenAI’s new flagship, GPT-5, in Azure AI Foundry. This is more than a new model release; it is the most powerful large language model (LLM) ever released across key benchmarks. The post GPT-5 in Azure AI Foundry: The future of AI apps and agents starts here appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/gpt-5-in-azure-ai-foundry-the-future-of-ai-apps-and-agents-starts-here/
